Class AnalyticsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.support.AnalyticsHelper

  • public class AnalyticsHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    CurveProductHelper contains the collection of the analytics related utility functions used by the modules

      • Yield2DF

        public static final double Yield2DF(int iFreqIn,
              double dblYield,
              double dblTime)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the discount factor from the specified frequency, yield, and accrual year fraction
        Parameters:
        iFreqIn - Input frequency - if zero, set to semi-annual.
        dblYield - Yield
        dblTime - Time in DC years
        Returns:
        the discount factor
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if input are invalid.

      • DF2Yield

        public static final double DF2Yield(int iFreqIn,
              double dblDF,
              double dblTime)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the yield from the specified discount factor to the given time.
        Parameters:
        iFreqIn - Yield calculation frequency - defaults to semi-annual if zero.
        dblDF - Discount Factor
        dblTime - Time to which the yield/DF are specified
        Returns:
        Implied yield
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if yield cannot be computed

      • GenerateLossPeriods

        public static final java.util.List<LossPeriodCurveFactors> GenerateLossPeriods(CreditComponent comp,
                                                         ValuationParams valParams,
                                                         PricerParams pricerParams,
                                                         Period period,
                                                         double dblWorkoutDate,
                                                         ComponentMarketParams mktParams)
        Creates a set of loss period measures
        Parameters:
        comp - Component for which the measures are to be generated
        valParams - ValuationParams from which the periods are generated
        pricerParams - PricerParams that control the generation characteristics
        period - The enveloping coupon period
        dblWorkoutDate - Double JulianDate representing the absolute end of all the generated periods
        mktParams - ComponentMarketParams that contain the discount and the credit curves
        Returns:
        List of the generated ProductLossPeriodCurveMeasures

        Bumps the input array quotes
        Parameters:
        adblQuotesIn - Array of the input double quotes
        dblBump - Bump amount
        bIsProportional - True => Bump is proportional
        Returns:
        Bumped array output
